project_name: Real-Time Chat and Video Calling Application

items.title: Real-Time Text Chat
items.description: Implement a real-time text messaging feature allowing users to send and receive messages instantly.
acceptance_criteria: Messages sent by a user appear to the recipient within 1 second under normal network conditions
Messages are displayed in chronological order in the chat window
Unread messages are clearly indicated to the user
non_functional: Latency under 1 second for message delivery
Support for at least 10,000 concurrent users

items.title: Video Calling
items.description: Enable one-to-one and group video calls with real-time audio and video streaming.
acceptance_criteria: Users can initiate and receive video calls
Video and audio quality remains stable with less than 300ms latency under normal network conditions
Users can mute/unmute audio and enable/disable video during calls
non_functional: Support for HD video (720p) with adaptive bitrate
End-to-end encryption for video and audio streams

notes: Assumed that the application will support both web and mobile platforms; group chat and group video calls are included in scope unless clarified otherwise.
